verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
There’s not a friend
like the lowly Jesus,
No not one! No, not one!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
There’s not a friend
like the lowly Jesus,
No, not one! No, not one!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
None else could heal
all our soul’s diseases,
No, not one! No, not one!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
No friend like Him
is so high and holy,
No, not one! No, not one!

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
And yet no friend
is so meek and lowly,
No, not one! No, not one!

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
There’s not an hour
that He is not near us,
No, not one! No, not one!

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
No night so dark but
His love can cheer us,
No, not one! No, not one!

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Did ever saint find
this Friend forsake him?
No, not one! No, not one!

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Or sinner find that
He would not take him?
No, not one! No, not one!

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Was e’er a gift like
the Savior given?
No, not one! No, not one!

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
Will He refuse us
a home in heaven?
No, not one! No, not one!
